website_summaries.verdict: A unique option for having a classic-looking and functional steering wheel spinner all in one knob.
pros: The all-aluminum construction and zinc mounting plate stand out in retro and vintage style cars
Steering knob is taller than most other options, providing extra leverage in turns
cons: May require a shim to fit on smaller steering wheels found on boats
Too small for larger truck steering wheels

customer_reviews.title: The best on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This spinner is just what I was looking for and works perfectly. The axis of the spinner on almost all of the units at Amazon are offset from center and stick out beyond the steering wheel. This is much better with a centered axis. Fine quality metal and spins nicely. I think there are ball bearings supporting the handle, but not sure. The attachment hardware is extremely versatile. The only thing you would possibly have to change is to substitute longer attachment bolts if you had a very fat steering wheel, but these are easily obtained and may already be in your garage.
customer_reviews.author: Daddy Waddy

customer_reviews.title: It works fine like that but it's not right
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, it's OK. It frees up my beer hand. I'm using it on my John Deere 125 riding mower. It comes with 2 back plates and the bigger one fits my thick steering wheel. The bolts are too short for the thick wheel. Bearings work well. The finish was rubbed off when I got it, new. The top cross plate won't stay on the top of the steering wheel so I put it at a 45* angle where the spoke meets the wheel. It works fine like that but it's not right. Good enough for this application, it's a lawn mower, but if it had to be nice I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: chris larson

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome! My 1971 Dodge Sweptlines manual steering turns so ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome ! My 1971 Dodge Sweptlines manual steering turns so much easier backing into spots , up to the trailer , or just going around town . The knob swivels very freely , and does not slip . I used my own hardware because of the thickness of the steering wheel . Al;l in all , for the money , it is a very nice piece . I will be putting one in my '73 Dodge truck too . . .
customer_reviews.author: Todd Sanger

customer_reviews.title: Just the spinner for an old guy with limited range of movement.
customer_reviews.text: This wheel spinners is rock solid and bullet proof. Many reviews for steering wheel spinners complained about them becoming loose (not staying in place), or breaking. I did have to modify the mounting clamp to fit my golf cart, but this spinner's ball bearings were worth the extra modification time.
customer_reviews.author: f1ycaster

customer_reviews.title: Polished Aluminum Wheel Spinner
customer_reviews.text: Quality made. Would have gotten 5 stars if I didn't have to got buy longer bolts to fit on my rig. But big deal. I hade to make a trip to a hardware store. Poor me. Spins smoothly and it's has zero plastic! You'll dig it.
customer_reviews.author: Mattybone Peeks

customer_reviews.title: I had another one of my vehicles outfitted with a far more expensive spinner knob an d flat out like these affordable options be
customer_reviews.text: For price ease of installation you can't beat this one.I had another one of my vehicles outfitted with a far more expensive spinner knob an d flat out like these affordable options better.None of us wants to need one of these but for those that do ,keep it simple and be sure to add lock washers if the one you get doesn't come with them. This one fortunately does.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Langly

customer_reviews.title: Not Useable
customer_reviews.text: A nice product but for me it didn't work out. Because of the design of the mounting plate with two "wings" on it I was not able to find a way to mount it on the steering wheel of my Simplicity lawn tractor. Also there is a small dent in the top of it, not something that affects how it would work but still not a perfect new item. I will ty to sell it locally as maybe someone will be able to make it work on a different steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Jurkowski

customer_reviews.title: best suicide knob ive found, and its not just for cars!
customer_reviews.text: i love this thing but gave it 4 stars becuse when it arrived, the bracket was less a U and more a V. a couple taps with a hammer fixed that and it fit fine, though did damage the finish. i loved the suicide knob on the forklift, and decided to install one on the autoscrubber. like the forklifts knob, this thing sits in the middle of the wheel instead of off to the side, allowing full and easy range of movement, and superior control in tight spots. its easy to install and remove as well, and stays in place regardless of heavy use, very solid.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel V

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on my John Deere mower so I could mow using one hand after having shoulder surgery. I was concerned that it may not stay tight but it works great. I had to use longer screws but worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Monty T.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for the wheel I purchased it for, looks to be made good otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: Looks to be of good quality. Unfortunately can't use it for the steering wheel I purchased it for. The bottom part that surrounds the wheel is too small, seems to small for ANY steering wheel I've seen. Also, even if it did fit the wheel the bolts are to short. A quick trip to hardware store will fix the bolt problem but can't fix the bottom part that is to small. I'm going to return it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M.

customer_reviews.title: It rusts in 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: I loved when I first installed it. Good size and it fitted my boat steering wheel perfectly. The knob still moves very smoothly, but look what a terrible job the manufacturer made with the brackets. In 2 months the rust was already damaging my boat steering wheel. They forgot to say that it is good only for fresh water.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaCustomer

customer_reviews.title: So good it's no longer a suicide handle
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used a suicide handle in 20 years. And this is one of the few products that have gotten much better. It's smooth, comfortable and work's great so good it shouldn't be called a suicide handle anymore.
customer_reviews.author: warlord

customer_reviews.title: IT'S OK, BUT NOT GREAT.
customer_reviews.text: IT WORKS WELL, ONCE INSTALLED, HOWEVER IT IS A PAIN TO INSTALL! IT BARELY REACHED AROUND MY KUBOTA 4340'S STEERING WHEEL. IT ALSO SITS HIGH ABOVE THE WHEEL, COULD HAVE A BETTER MOUNT DESIGN.
customer_reviews.author: THUMS-UP

customer_reviews.title: Not for a thin wheel.  Clamp is large
customer_reviews.text: Nice spinner. Well made. Turns nicely. The clamp was a bit big for the wheel on my boat. I put a rubber shim under the clamp to hold it tight and to protect the wheel from scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Credx2

customer_reviews.title: SPINNER on steering wheel
customer_reviews.text: This spinner is nice looking, and sturdy. I only wish they supplied rubber to go under it so it does not cause pressure marks on the steering wheel but other than that very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bock

customer_reviews.title: Installed on my golf cart.
customer_reviews.text: Knob comes with 2 adapters to use depending on the thickness of your steering wheel. It mounted firmly to the skinny steering wheel on my cart and seems well built.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Famularo

customer_reviews.title: It worked perfectly on our Polaris 900 Ranger. My ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly on our Polaris 900 Ranger. My husband just found out he has RA and this makes driving the Ranger and lot easier with the pain in his hands.
customer_reviews.author: Tami B. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: I love there are no plastic parts and will probably last ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit the steering wheel in the John Deere combine perfectly. Made harvest sooo much easier. I love there are no plastic parts and will probably last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: roll cyclones

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but no bearings, and it's loose and sloppy. I don't expect it to last long, but only time will tell. I would probably have given it at least 4 stars if it had decent bearings.
customer_reviews.author: Gale Haines

customer_reviews.title: How in the heck does this install? Zero instructions! Weird design.
customer_reviews.text: What is there to like? It didn’t even come close to fitting my 1” steering wheel. No instructions included and seller couldn’t provide any useful information. It did feel sturdy, but never could get it installed.
customer_reviews.author: JUSTCOCONUTS

customer_reviews.title: It hard to tell what it fits but nice product
customer_reviews.text: My fault for ordering the wrong one, didn't fit well on husqvarna tractor but it's well made and will use it on something else
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Good value, in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Good value, in my opinion. Does loosen up a bit with time, but have only had to re-tighten about once every 6 weeks. I bought it because I have muscle weakness. Back in control!
customer_reviews.author: tom poulton

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty. Steel roller no plastic!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my concrete mixer which takes a lot of maneuvering to get closer to the jobs. More Percision holding your lane at higher speeds. Can’t live without it.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy wife

customer_reviews.title: Relax while you drive
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my tractor. I remember my Grandfather having them on his tractors

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: I brought for use when I shifting in yards but the idea of installing (set up) on steering isn’t really designed,I have ask mechanic to helping. It’s ok to use after setup.......😩

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift
customer_reviews.text: Father in law wanted one so I sent him this one and he seems to like it

customer_reviews.title: spins nicely and works great
customer_reviews.text: Product and hardware fit my steering wheel but the strap that goes around the back side is a little small. Be aware of this. Otherwise, spins nicely and works great. The hardware has started to rust a little as this is for my boat and is exposed to the elements. All of that said, I would still buy this knuckle buster again
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars I would, inaccurate description plus no return , this is a waste of money

customer_reviews.title: ... one has zero turn or has steering wheel working great had to trim rubber coating on wheel to be ...
customer_reviews.text: added to my 2 riding mowers one has zero turn or has steering wheel working great had to trim rubber coating on wheel to be able to fit around and get tight

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: Use it on my NH tractor with power steering. I like it.

customer_reviews.text: Had to enlarge the clamp to fit the wheel. Worked ok.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to mess up a simple device like a "spinner" but this one is even better as ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard to mess up a simple device like a "spinner" but this one is even better as it is ball bearings. Great transaction.

customer_reviews.title: Not for padded steering wheels
customer_reviews.text: Will not fit newer vehicles with wrapped steering wheels. I bought it for a friend who was disabled in a accident and only has use of one arm. He lives 300 miles away from me. He came up for a visit and I was going to surprise him by installing it on his vehicle. Wouldn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Sgrabiec

customer_reviews.title: If you have a salt water boat, you need this for quick maneuvering... Or even in fresh water.
customer_reviews.text: Just put it on our new, (used), boat. Heavy duty, classic shine, stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Manoli

customer_reviews.title: Makes driving vehicles with standard transmission much easier
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing, I've got one on every vehicle i drive and now my whole family has one too. A must have for backing trailers and for anyone driving a vehicle with a standard transmission. Shifting while turning is a breeze
customer_reviews.author: Carson Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. I had no trouble getting it installed and it works great. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my 2005 Polaris Ranger and it works like a charm!

customer_reviews.text: Well made Using it on one of my Deere tractors, Love it. Recommended

customer_reviews.title: Fun, Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Spins fine; works well. Don't install it low on the weel because the screws stick out and can cut you if you are not careful.

customer_reviews.text: Strong and durable made from quality metal. I've had it in my truck for two years and tis still going strong.

customer_reviews.text: Chrome is dull looking has pit marks in chrome did not fit right on my 2014 camaro steering wheel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product

customer_reviews.text: This review pertains ONLY TO BOAT USE. I didn't pick up that the back of the bracket was zinc coated steel, and it rusted to hell. Not their fault, but just want to warn you if you are going to use this for a boat, don't!

customer_reviews.text: Very smooth and sturdy. Much better than the JD one I had on the tractor

customer_reviews.title: Wish screws were a bit longer but very sturdy and
customer_reviews.text: Wish screws were a bit longer but very sturdy and tough

customer_reviews.title: It cuts into the steering wheel of my $60, ...
customer_reviews.text: It cuts into the steering wheel of my $60,000 Ram. To keep this from happening, I went to lowes and spent $10 on some longer (2") screws and some foam weatherstripping. I wrapped the foam weatherstripping around the wheel, then wrapped electrical tape around the weatherstripping, then I tightened the screws down with the clamps over the weatherstripping, not the steering wheel. Seems to be working for now, not sure if its going to hold.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Won't fit large diameter steering wheels
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2007 Ford truck and there was no way this would fit as it was delivered. I had to mount it on the wheel with bolts that were twice as long as the ones that came with it. Don't know how well it works yet, but I suspect it will be fine. Since it is made of metal, I can't wait to grab hold of it after it bakes in the arizona sun for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What can I say spins the steering wheel like a charm

customer_reviews.title: Very good!! This one bolts on to steering wheel
customer_reviews.text: Very good!! This one bolts on to steering wheel, don't buy the ones that just snap on. They fall off and it's annoying. I own two of these for my two vehicles
customer_reviews.author: Julie Masuicca

customer_reviews.title: Have leather cover on steering wheel and it seems this ...
customer_reviews.text: Have leather cover on steering wheel and it seems this product keeps shifting and is not stable on the wheel. Had to have longer screws and they stick out the underside and have torn a pair of pants on them when the wheel is in down position.
customer_reviews.author: Hotair

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this
customer_reviews.text: Developed a small crack in the base of the handle. Used it driving a yard hauler at Dole (yes, your bananas and pineapples). Not gonna buy this one again, it did not last long. Don't waste $. ps., photo is the Dole yard and those are your containers lined up in the feather pattern. Yes, I do work there, driving the UTRs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazed by upchuck

customer_reviews.title: it is very sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: I believe this product is made for speedboats or other marine craft. However, it is very sturdy and well made. Other ones I have used were made of cheap plastic and broke. This has a bearing in it. I used it on my Ford Van and it works great.

product_meta.title: United Pacific 70108 Heavy Duty Aluminum Steering Wheel Spinner,Metallic
product_meta.description: Heavy Duty Aluminum Steering Wheel Spinner. Time tested quality and durabilty for commercial trucks & heavy equipment. Heavy duty ball bearing design with metal base, and includes 2 metal brackets to fit most steering wheels
feature_bullets: Designed to reduce effort and fatigue
Time tested quality and durabilty for commercial trucks & heavy equipment
Heavy duty ball bearing design with metal base, and includes 2 metal brackets to fit most steering wheels
Note: Universal design may require bracket modification to fit application. May cause perminent damage to the steering wheel, especially wood, rubber & leather.
Check laws and/or regulations in your state, county, and/or municipality regarding installation and use of this product

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars252 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
